IoT Remote Sensors

Welcome to Design Criteria, where we lead the way in remote smart sensor technology for electrical systems. We design and manufacture remote sensors for IoT applications, catering to both smart home and business environments.

Our expertise lies in seamlessly integrating these advanced sensors to provide:

  • Real-time monitoring and optimization capabilities
  • Intuitively designed application tools for precise and efficient remote system tracking
  • State-of-the-art technology that ensures an extended lifespan
Monitoring Solutions

Advanced Remote Monitoring Solutions for Smart Inventory Management

Our previous designs include remote monitoring devices that automatically measures the amount of liquid in sealed tanks 24 hours a day and calls a host computer to report the status of the tank contents.

These Smart Inventory Management Systems link to the user's phone line allowing for ease of access and is the only external connection the management system needs. In addition, calling times can be selected by the user which will minimize phone line interruptions.

Our engineers take the greatest care to incorporate the most advanced technology when designing our smart sensors.

Transform Your
IoT Today

Experience the transformative potential of remote smart sensors with us today and revolutionize your electrical infrastructure for the future.
